text: Robert "Bob" Folsom (February 15, 1927 - January 24, 2017) was an American politician and real estate developer. He served as the Mayor of Dallas, Texas from 1976 until 1981. He graduated from the Southern Methodist University. He was born in Dallas. Folsom died from natural causes on January 24, 2017 at his home in Dallas. He was 89. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mayors of Dallas Category:Real estate developers
title: Robert Folsom
